issue.title: GetLinearAcceleration always returns zeros for ODE

content.raw:
just tried to reproduce this scenario (see 8678cf0 and 87d3dfc),

~~~
gazebo gazebo/test/worlds/imu_sensor_test.world
~~~

prints out non-zero linear acceleration values.

~~~
gztopic echo /gazebo/default/model_1/link_2/imu_sensor/imu
~~~

also prints out non-zero linear acceleration values.  Further, acceleration values for the falling ball (at least the non-friction case) appears correct.

So... is the problem here:

 * issue has been fixed already,
 * `<always_on>` flag is not set in the `<sensor>` block,
 * IMU sensor `GetLinearAcceleration` not called using `gazebo::sensors::Sensor::ConnectUpdated` (I don't think this is really a problem though, as the values are cached in imuMsg).
 * a new release of gazebo 2.2 is needed (and push it into ROS repo), or
 * something else?
